text: "Hail to Bermuda" is the anthem of Bermuda. ==Lyrics== I Hail to Bermuda, My island in the sun. Sing out in glory To the nation we've become. We've grown from heart to heart, And strength to strength, The privilege is mine To sing long live Bermuda, Because this island's mine! II Hail to Bermuda, My homeland dear to me. This is my own land Built on faith And unity. We've grown from heart to heart And strength to strength, For Loyalty is Prime So sing long live Bermuda, Because this island's mine! ==References== Category:Bermuda Category:North American anthems
title: Hail to Bermuda
